title.rendered: ClinLab Staffing ranked among the Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Massachusetts by Boston Business Journal

content.rendered:
Boston, MA., May 12, 2017 – ClinLab Staffing announced today that it has been ranked No. 38 by Boston Business Journal on its Fastest-Growing Private Companies List.  The rankings were published May 12.  To view the complete List, read more.  

The companies were ranked by percentage of growth 2013 to 2016.

“We are happy to named to the BBJ FAST 50 List,” said ClinLab Staffing CEO, Andrius Montvila. “I am proud of our incredible team and look forward to adding talent in 2017 and 2018. Our success is built on the life sciences boom Massachusetts has incubated over the last 10 years. We feel very confident hiring new staff and expanding our offices in 2017.”

The Boston Business Journal is the No. 1 business journal in New England, providing news and information in print, online and in person throughout Greater Boston.

From technology and the life sciences to healthcare, real estate, law and finance, the Business Journal covers the most relevant and timely topics for the Eastern Massachusetts business community.

Every day, the Business Journal provides exclusive news on BostonBusinessJournal.com and via e-newsletters delivered in the morning and afternoon. Every Friday, the Business Journal’s Weekly Edition provides an in-depth lineup of breaking local news stories, trends and analysis, and business profiles, along with our award-winning industry rankings and Top 25 lists.

Thousands of established and up-and-coming businesspeople and executives visit BostonBusinessJournal.com daily to find the information they need to do business in Greater Boston.
